mapper.select: select eventKey, name, category, registerId, statusCode, registerDateTime from event order by eventKey desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select eventKey, name, category, registerId, statusCode, registerDateTime from event where name like concat('%', #{searchWord} ,'%') order by eventKey desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from event where name like concat('%', #{searchWord} ,'%')
select count(*) from event where statusCode = #{option}
select count(*) from event where statusCode = #{option} and name like concat('%', #{searchWord} ,'%')
mapper.insert: insert into event (name, content, category, registerId, statusCode, startDateTime, endDateTime, registerDateTime) values (#{name}, #{content}, #{category}, #{registerId}, #{statusCode}, #{startDateTime}, #{endDateTime}, now())
INSERT INTO EVENT_FILE ( EVENT_KEY, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_URL, FILE_CONTENT_TYPE ) VALUES ( #{eventKey}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileUrl}, #{fileContentType} )
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_URL FROM EVENT_FILE WHERE EVENT_KEY = #{eventKey}
